Name: GameZero
About the game: Two castles defend their keep against invaders, defend them and hone your skills in the arena to gain weapons and armor, and conquer greater foes! An online mmo experience, GameZero uses ummorpg and unity partnered with steam to provide an immersive online experience. Over 15 sets of armor to acquire and 50 weapons to increase your potential on the battlefield! Play online with friends or build a server yourself and host for others.
Meta Title: GameZero: Jul 14, 2022, Tomas and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on GameZero? Check out the release date (Jul 14, 2022), developer insights from Tomas, and a complete game summary.
